TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataViewSetting extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents the default settings for <xref:System.Data.DataView.ApplyDefaultSort%2A>, <xref:System.Data.DataView.DataViewManager%2A>, <xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter%2A>, <xref:System.Data.DataView.RowStateFilter%2A>, <xref:System.Data.DataView.Sort%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.DataView.Table%2A> for DataViews created from the <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use the default sort.
Docs.value: `true` if the default sort is used; otherwise `false`.

Docs.summary: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataViewManager"> that contains this <xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting>.
Gets or sets the filter to apply in the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView">. See <xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter%2A> for a code sample using RowFilter.
Docs.value: A string that contains the filter to apply.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to display Current, Deleted, Modified Current, ModifiedOriginal, New, Original, Unchanged, or no rows in the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView">.
Docs.value: A value that indicates which rows to display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The default value of RowStateFilter is `DataViewRowState.CurrentRows`.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the sort to apply in the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView">.
Docs.value: The sort to apply in the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataView">.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Data.DataView.Sort%2A> can have two defaults based on the value of <xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter%2A> property. If <xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter%2A> is null or empty (that is, the value is not explicitly specified), the <xref:System.Data.DataRowView> in the <xref:System.Data.DataView> is sorted on the position or ordinal of <xref:System.Data.DataRow> in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Rows%2A> collection. The <xref:System.Data.DataView.Sort%2A> default, an empty string, causes a <xref:System.Data.DataRowView> in <xref:System.Data.DataView> to be sorted on the position or ordinal of <xref:System.Data.DataRow> in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Rows%2A> collection.

Docs.summary: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable"> to which the <xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting> properties apply.
